com.github.mrivanplays.bungee.bossbar.api

Interface Bossbar

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyedBossbar

    public interface Bossbar
    Represents a new bossbar api

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOnlinePlayers()
      Adds all online ProxiedPlayer to the bossbar
      void addOnlinePlayersAfter(Plugin plugin, int delay, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Adds all online ProxiedPlayer to the bossbar after some time specified in the unit
      void addPlayer(ProxiedPlayer player)
      Adds a ProxiedPlayer to the bossbar
      void addPlayerAfter(ProxiedPlayer player, Plugin plugin, int delay, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Adds a ProxiedPlayer to the bossbar after some amount of time Useful if you use the bossbar on join and send to the players a title
      BarColor getColor()
      Gets the BarColor of the bossbar
      java.util.List<ProxiedPlayer> getPlayers()
      Gets all ProxiedPlayers added into the bossbar

      Gets the progress of the bossbar

      Gets the BarStyle of the bossbar

      Gets the bossbar title as BarTitle

      Gets the bossbar title as String.

      Checks if the bossbar is visible or no

      Removes all players from the bossbar and clears getPlayers() Removes the bossbar

      Removes all players from the bossbar after some amount of time

      void setVisible(boolean visible)

        delay - delay in unit
        unit - delay's unit

      • addPlayerAfter

        void addPlayerAfter(ProxiedPlayer player,
                    Plugin plugin,
                    int delay,
                    java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Adds a ProxiedPlayer to the bossbar after some amount of time Useful if you use the bossbar on join and send to the players a title
        Parameters:
        player - added player
        plugin - plugin assigned to
        delay - delay in the unit specified
        unit - delay's unit
